STATUS.md.summary: Active plugin v0.2.0. Phase 1 + legacy commands working. v0.2 roadmap defined with 5 GitHub issues. Triage CI suspended.

NEXT_ACTIONS.md.summary: 5 tasks linked to GitHub issues. T-004 (refactor) and T-005 (tests) are high priority. T-006 (config), T-007 (windows fix) medium. T-003 (triage CI) low/blocked.

LOG.md.summary: Latest: v0.2 roadmap definition (5 GitHub issues). Previous: AAHP v3 migration, Phase 1 commands, staging smoke, triage CI.

DASHBOARD.md.summary: v0.2 roadmap with 5 GitHub issues. T-004 through T-007 linked to issues #1-#5.

TRUST.md.summary: Commands assumed working. No build/test verification. Triage CI untested.

CONVENTIONS.md.summary: Report-only for destructive ops, staging gate, no secrets in output.

WORKFLOW.md.summary: 2-agent pipeline. Safety rules: no secrets in output, staging gate required.

quick_context: openclaw-ops v0.2.0 active plugin. All commands working. 133 vitest tests passing across 6 test files. Test coverage: src/utils.ts (45 tests), index.ts entry point (6 tests), phase1-commands (18 tests), legacy-commands (24 tests), observer-commands (24 tests), skills-commands (16 tests). src/test-helpers.ts provides shared mock API for command testing. T-005 (tests) done, T-006 (config) ready, T-003 (triage) blocked.
